name: Laser Defender (Sanni)
description:
A practice game using the new input system of Unity 2020, FMOD, and a tutorial from Udemy for the core. I have done additional game design and balancing, and modified some of the code from the tutorial.


Controls
  • Use WASD or Arrow keys to move your ship
  • Press Space bar, Numpad 0, or Left Mouse click to shoot

Credits

Kenney: Space Shooter Redux

SketchyLogic: NES Shooter Music

Rick Davidson: Complete C# Unity Game Developer 2D
